Make a new variable

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Object name

"Name" for the variable (arbitrary object)
Problem problem

Problem of which this variable is a part
Literal condition

Condition under which this variable is to have a value; if null, it's always defined.

Fields

Condition

Condition under which this variable is defined. If true or if Condition is null, the variable must have a value. If false, it must not have a value.

public readonly Literal Condition
